ruleExplore.author: author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2亿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2万')
    .replace(/\.0([万亿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' · ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + '点击');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + '月票');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    last: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: [
      o.serialStatus == 0 ? '连载' : '完结',
      String(
        J.select('.bookinfo a')
          .eq(1)
          .text()
      )
    ].join(','),
    last:
      o.updteChapterName + ' · ' +
      new Date(o.updateTime).toISOString().replace(/T.*/, ''),
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    wordCount: String(
      J.select('.bookinfo span')
        .eq(1)
        .text()
    ),
    url:
      'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' +
      o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleSearch.name: name

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var bookId = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1];

JSON.parse(String(result))
  .chapterlist.chapters.filter(o => !o.chapterName.includes('作品相关'))
  .map(o => {
    return {
      name: o.chapterName.replace(/^正文\s+/, ''),
      url:
        'http://huayu.zongheng.com/chapter/' +
        bookId +
        '/' +
        o.chapterId +
        '.html',
      vip: o.level > 0
    };
  });
</js>

<js>
var json=JSON.parse(result).Data;
var bid=json.BookId;
var base="https://m.qidian.com/book/"+bid+"/";

json.Chapters.slice(1).map(ch=>({
title:ch.N,
link:base+ch.C,
vip:ch.V,
time:java.timeFormat(ch.T)
}))
</js>

searchUrl:
<js> var body = {
  "sort": "default",
  "page": 1,
  "q": "{{key}}",
  "rootKind": "",
  "query": "
    query getFilterWorksList($works_ids: [ID!]) {
      worksList(worksIds: $works_ids) {
        
    
    title
    cover
    url
    isBundle
    coverLabel
  
    
    url
    title
  
    
    author {
      name
      url
    }
    origAuthor {
      name
      url
    }
    translator {
      name
      url
    }
  
    
    abstract
    editorHighlight
  
    
    isOrigin
    kinds {
      
    name @skip(if: true)
    shortName @include(if: true)
    id
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      wordCount
      wordCountUnit
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    isEssay
    
    ... on EssayWorks {
      favorCount
    }
  
    
    isNew
    
    averageRating
    ratingCount
    url
  
  
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      isColumn
      isEssay
      onSaleTime
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        updateTime
      }
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      isColumn
      ... on ColumnWorks {
        isFinished
      }
    }
    ... on EssayWorks {
      essayActivityData {
        
    title
    uri
    tag {
      name
      color
      background
      icon2x
      icon3x
      iconSize {
        height
      }
      iconPosition {
        x y
      }
    }
  
      }
    }
    highlightTags {
      name
    }
  
    isInLibrary
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: false) {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on EbookWorks {
      
    fixedPrice
    salesPrice
    isRebate
  
    }
    ... on WorksBase @include(if: true) {
      ... on EbookWorks {
        id
        isPurchased
        isInWishlist
      }
    }
  
        id
        isOrigin
      }
    }
  ",
  "variables": {}
};
var option = {"method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(body) }; "https://read.douban.com/j/search_v2," + JSON.stringify(option) </js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//取正文
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="[A-Z].*?">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$_\$/g,"5")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__/g,"4")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$\$/g,"3")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")
.replace(/\/\/125/g,"U")
.replace(/\/\/124/g,"T")
.replace(/\/\/123/g,"S")
.replace(/\/\/122/g,"R")
.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")
.replace(/\/\/113/g,"K")
.replace(/\/\/112/g,"J")
.replace(/\/\/111/g,"I")
.replace(/\/\/110/g,"H")
.replace(/\/\/107/g,"G")
.replace(/\/\/106/g,"F")
.replace(/\/\/105/g,"E")
.replace(/\/\/104/g,"D")
.replace(/\/\/103/g,"C")
.replace(/\/\/102/g,"B")
.replace(/\/\/101/g,"A")
.replace(/\/\/100/g,"@")
//小写字母
.replace(/5\_​/g,"a")
.replace(/5\$/g,"b")
.replace(/6\_​/g,"c")
.replace(/6\$/g,"d")
.replace(/7\_​/g,"e")
.replace(/7\$/g,"f")
.replace(/\/\/147/g,"g")
.replace(/\/\/150/g,"h")
.replace(/\/\/151/g,"i")
.replace(/\/\/152/g,"j")
.replace(/\/\/153/g,"k")
.replace(/\(\!\[\]\)\[2\]/g,"l")
.replace(/\/\/155/g,"m")
.replace(/\/\/156/g,"n")
.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$/g,"o")
.replace(/\/\/160/g,"p")
.replace(/\/\/161/g,"q")
.replace(/\/\/162/g,"r")
.replace(/\/\/163/g,"s")
.replace(/[A-Z].__/g,"t")
.replace(/[A-Z]._/g,"u")
.replace(/\/\/166/g,"v")
.replace(/\/\/167/g,"w")
.replace(/\/\/170/g,"x")
.replace(/\/\/171/g,"y")
.replace(/\/\/172/g,"z")
//英文符号
.replace(/\/\/72/g,":")
.replace(/\/\/73/g," ")
.replace(/\/\/77/g,"?")
.replace(/\/\/\/\/u(.{4})/g,"%u$1");
密文=unescape(content)
//放回原位
result=String(a);
result=result.replace(/自动加载/,密文)
//分隔符
.replace(/防采集/g,"")
.replace(/失败.*?浏览器！/g,"")
</js>

function decrypt(data){
    var key = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse("bmpsZW1lbmcyMDE4MjAxNw==");
    var iv = CryptoJS.enc.Base64.parse('MTIzNDU2NzgxMjM0NTY3OA==');

    var decryptedData = CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(data, key, {
        iv: iv,
        mode: CryptoJS.mode.CBC,
        padding: CryptoJS.pad.Pkcs7
    });
    return JSON.parse(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8.stringify(decryptedData));
}

<js>
var i,n,url0,url1,all;
var url=[];
header="@header:{referer=\"https://bookshelf.html5.qq.com/?t=native&sc_id=1\"}";
url0=String(baseUrl).replace(/(.*start=).*/,"$1");
url1=String(baseUrl).replace(/.*start=\d+(.*)/,"$1");
all=String(baseUrl).replace(/.*serialnum=(\d+).*/,"$1");
n=parseInt(all)/10+1;
//必须
url[0]=header+url0+"2"+url1;
url[1]=header+url0+"3"+url1;
//判断
for(i=4;i<=n;i++)
 url[i]=header+url0+i+url1;
url
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var tmp, sid, id;
var text = '';
var alias = {
  'tophub.today': 'tophub-today',
  'daily.zhihu': 'zhihu-daily',
  hjenglish: 'hujiang-en'
};

if (baseUrl.includes('_id')) {
  sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  id = baseUrl.match(/[^_]id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
} else {
  for (var key in alias) {
    if (baseUrl.includes(key)) {
      sid = alias[key];
      break;
    }
  }
}

switch (sid) {
  case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
    tmp = java.ajax('https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv' + id);
    java.setContent(tmp);
    text = java.getString('class.article-holder@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'zhihu-daily': {
    text = java.getString('class.content@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'hujiang-en': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.article-content@html')).replace(
      /（翻译.+）|图片来源.+/g,
      ''
    );
    break;
  }
  case 'tophub-today': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.Zd-p-Sc@html'))
      .replace(
        //g,
        '\n.\n                      - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -\n.\n'
      )
      .replace(/网页端只展示.+/, '');
    break;
  }
}

if (!text) {
  text = '｡◕‿◕｡' + (sid ? '\n' + sid : '');
}

text;

</js>

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var o = [];
if (!baseUrl.includes('debug')) {
  importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);

  var sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  var tmp, data;
  // title, author, tags, new, intro, cover, url
  var page = baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/);
  page = page ? page[1] : '';

  switch (sid) {
    case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
      // 哔哩哔哩专栏排行榜
      function toList(str) {
        var arr = JSON.parse(str).data;
        arr.forEach(a => {
          if (o.every(v => v.id !== a.id)) {
            o.push({
              id: a.id,
              title: a.title,
              author: a.author.name,
              tags: a.categories.map(v => v.name),
              intro: a.summary,
              new: a.dynamic,
              cover: a.banner_url,
              url: baseUrl + '&id=' + a.id
            });
          }
        });
      }
      var rankUrl = 'https://api.bilibili.com/x/article/rank/list?cid=';
      // 昨天
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '3');
      toList(tmp);

      // 前天
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '4');
      toList(tmp);

      // 周榜
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '2');
      toList(tmp);

      // 月榜
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '1');
      toList(tmp);

      break;
    }

    case 'zhihu-daily': {
      o = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax('https://daily.zhihu.com'))
        .select('.main-content-wrap a')
        .toArray()
        .map(a => {
          var url = 'https://daily.zhihu.com' + a.attr('href');
          var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
          var author = J.select('.meta .author')
            .text()
            .replace('，', '');
          return {
            url: url,
            title: a.text(),
            cover: a.select('img').attr('src'),
            author: author,
            tags: [author],
            new: J.select('.meta .bio').text(),
            intro: J.select('.content p:first-child')
              .text()
              .trim()
          };
        })
        .filter(v => !v.title.includes('如何正确地吐槽'));
      break;
    }

    case 'hujiang-en': {
      var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com/fanyi/shuangyu';

      url += page ? '_' + page + '/' : '/';

      var groups = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url))
        .select('.left-content .sp-article-module')
        .toArray()
        .forEach(list => {
          var defaulCover = list.select('img').attr('data-src');
          list
            .select('a')
            .toArray()
            .forEach(a => {
              var title = a.text().replace('有声双语美文：', '');

              if (/1、优惠秒杀|英语课程/.test(title)) return;

              var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com' + a.attr('href');
              var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url)).select('.module-article');
              var cover = J.select('#J-article-content img:first-child').attr(
                'src'
              );
              cover = String(cover).trim();
              var content = J.select(
                '#J-article-content div[class*=langs]'
              ).html();
              var author = J.select('.info span:first-child').text();
              var trans = J.select('#J-article-content')
                .html()
                .match(/（(翻译：.+)）/);
              var tags = [author];
              if (trans) {
                tags.push(trans[1]);
              }
              o.push({
                cover: cover || defaulCover,
                title: title,
                url: url,
                author: author.replace('作者：', ''),
                tags: tags,
                new: J.select('.info span:nth-child(2)').text(),
                intro: content.slice(0, 500) + '...'
              });
            });
        });

      break;
    }

    case 'tophub-today': {
      var p = page ? '?p=' + page : '';
      var baseurl = 'https://tophub.today';

      function toList(url, nav) {
        var list = [];
        var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
        var tcs = J.select('.bc-tc').toArray();
        var ccs = J.select('.bc-cc').toArray();
        tcs.forEach((tc, i) => {
          var cc = ccs[i];
          var cds = cc.select('.cc-cd').toArray();
          cds.forEach(cd => {
            var title = cd.select('.cc-cd-lb').text();
            var tag = cd.select('.cc-cd-sb-st').text();
            var links = cd.select('.nano-content a').toArray();
            var intro = links
              .map((link, i) => i + 1 + '. ' + link.select('.t').text())
              .join('\n---\n');
            list.push({
              cover: cd.select('.cc-cd-lb img').attr('src'),
              title: title + ' - ' + tag,
              url: baseurl + cd.select('.cc-cd-is a').attr('href'),
              tags: [nav],
              new: cd.select('.i-h').text(),
              intro: intro
            });
          });
        });
        return list;
      }

      var navs = {
        综合: 'news',
        科技: 'tech',
        娱乐: 'ent',
        社区: 'community'
      };

      var lists = [];
      for (var name in navs) {
        var list = toList(baseurl + '/c/' + navs[name] + p, name);
        lists.push(list);
      }
      lists[0].forEach((v, i) => {
        lists.forEach((l, j) => {
          o.push(lists[j][i]);
        });
      });
    }
  }
}

o;

</js>
ruleSearch.name: title
